r.s: A package providing a common interface to image drawing, making image source code independent on the library used.
r.d: A package providing a common interface to image drawing, making image source code independent on the library used.
r.n: QA release Bug #16947 Font-size in GD (with GD2) incorrect Bug #17448 Font alignment for 90 degrees Bug #18366 Call to undefined function ps_new() Bug #18507 SVG output of multi-line axis labels is screwed up. Bug #18549 setThickness not working on GD / PNG output
